unnormalised: **Environmental News: Renewable Energy Gains Momentum Across India**
normalised: **Environmental News: Renewable Energy Gains Momentum Across India**

unnormalised: Namaste folks! Exciting news on the environmental front! India is seriously ramping up its renewable energy game.
normalised: Namaste folks! Exciting news on the environmental front! India is seriously ramping up its renewable energy game.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma at IIT-Delhi recently announced a breakthrough in solar panel efficiency, potentially lowering costs by 15%. That's massive!
normalised: Doctor Sharma at I I T hyphen Delhi recently announced a breakthrough in solar panel efficiency, potentially lowering costs by fifteen percent. That's massive!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Rajasthan continues to be a solar powerhouse, with a new 2000-acre solar park planned near Jodhpur. Think Thar Desert, but powered by the sun!
normalised: Meanwhile, Rajasthan continues to be a solar powerhouse, with a new two thousand acre solar park planned near Jodhpur. Think Thar Desert, but powered by the sun!

unnormalised: And it's not just solar. Wind energy projects are popping up along the Gujarat coastline, harnessing the power of the Arabian Sea breeze. Rs. 500 Crore has been allocated for further wind farm development.
normalised: And it's not just solar. Wind energy projects are popping up along the Gujarat coastline, harnessing the power of the Arabian Sea breeze. Rupee five hundred crore has been allocated for further wind farm development.

unnormalised: Even smaller initiatives are making a difference. Villages in the Himalayas are adopting micro-hydro projects, lighting up homes and businesses using locally sourced water power. A school in Kerala is now completely powered by rooftop solar, saving them on electricity bills and inspiring students!
normalised: Even smaller initiatives are making a difference. Villages in the Himalayas are adopting micro-hydro projects, lighting up homes and businesses using locally sourced water power. A school in Kerala is now completely powered by rooftop solar, saving them on electricity bills and inspiring students!

unnormalised: This all adds up to a greener future, one sq ft of solar panel and one wind turbine at a time. Jai Hind!
normalised: This all adds up to a greener future, one square foot of solar panel and one wind turbine at a time. Jai Hind!
